name: Create an Author with required fields only Test
description: Verifies that an author with the required fields only can be successfully created
descriptionHtml: Verifies that an author with the required fields only can be successfully created
statusMessage:
[The author object is not as expected] 
expected: "AuthorDto(id=610, bookId=201, firstName=null, lastName=null) (AuthorDto@600dad65)"
 but was: "AuthorDto(id=610, bookId=201, firstName=null, lastName=null) (AuthorDto@2ee24472)"
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: [The author object is not as expected] 
expected: "AuthorDto(id=610, bookId=201, firstName=null, lastName=null) (AuthorDto@600dad65)"
 but was: "AuthorDto(id=610, bookId=201, firstName=null, lastName=null) (AuthorDto@2ee24472)"
	at com.avenga.AuthorTest.verifyAuthor(AuthorTest.java:222)
	at com.avenga.AuthorTest.createAuthorWithRequiredFieldsOnlyTest(AuthorTest.java:98)

	at org.testng.internal.invokers.MethodInvocationHelper$1.runTestMethod(MethodInvocationHelper.java:258)
